Using Reports

The application allows you to generate a wide variety of reports about the folders and items in your projects. These reports can be used in presentations, discussions of project status, and numerous other situations.

Reports reflect the data shown on the upper pane in the project window. To display the data for the report, you can show or hide all descendants of a folder, sort and group items, and run queries and filters. You can also display additional fields, if desired.

Remember that a maximum of 60 fields can be displayed in the upper pane.
